sections.heading: States Government and government-guaranteed obligations
sections.text: An insurer may invest in direct obligations of the United States or obligations for which the full faith and credit of the United States is pledged for the payment of all principal and interest.SourceLaws 1991, LB 237, ยง 23.

44-5123.United States Government and government-guaranteed obligations.

An insurer may invest in direct obligations of the United States or obligations for which the full faith and credit of the United States is pledged for the payment of all principal and interest.

SourceLaws 1991, LB 237, ยง 23.
